It is not allowed to write the contact number in the ad text. Be sure to mention your response hours. Our experts will review your report. Fraud, violation of law or crime Ad content Problems with ad owner Confirm Cancel By touching the chat button on the page of any ad, you can send a message to the seller. Also, to receive messages about your ad, you need to activate the chat application when registering your ad.
